downloadTitle: Update Rollup 4 for System Center 2016 Service Manager
downloadDescription: Update Rollup 4 for System Center 2016 Service Manager
detailsSection:
Summary

This article describes the bug fixes that are included in this Update Rollup.

Issues that are fixed in this Update Rollup-
  • Service Manager 2016 will support TLS 1.2 with this update installed
  • System Center Configuration Manager 1710 is now supported for Configuration Manager Connectors in Service Manager
  • Self Service Portal navigation links do not work when the menu is in expanded state
  • Regex validation rules are not honoured in the Request offering form elements
  • Date/Time type fields reset the value to be stored to 12:00AM for certain time values (when translated time value in GMT is 00:00 hours)
  • The changes in a Business service get overwritten, if the Business service is a related item in a Service Request (SR) template which is getting used to create SR from Self Service Portal
installInstructionSection: Please refer KB4024038 for detailed installation instructions.
